description: This is a JavaScript source file defining a LightningJS component 'NotesList' which manages and displays a list of notes, including UI elements for adding, deleting, and selecting notes, as well as subscription to updates.

classes.name: NotesList
classes.description: A LightningJS component for displaying and managing a list of notes, including UI controls for adding, deleting, and selecting notes. It subscribes to note updates and maintains local state.

methods.name: $itemTitle
methods.description: Returns the title of a note, defaulting to 'Untitled' if not present.

methods.name: $itemUpdated
methods.description: Formats the 'updatedAt' timestamp of a note into a locale string.

methods.name: $rowColor
methods.description: Determines the background color of a list row based on selection.

methods.name: $itemY
methods.description: Calculates the Y position of an item based on its index and scroll position.

methods.name: $trashColor
methods.description: Determines the background color of the delete ('trash') button based on hover state.

methods.name: $onTrashHover
methods.description: Handles mouse hover over trash icon, setting hover index.

methods.name: $onTrashLeave
methods.description: Handles mouse leaving trash icon, resetting hover index.

methods.name: $onAddHover
methods.description: Handles mouse hover over add button, changing its color.

methods.name: $onAddLeave
methods.description: Handles mouse leaving add button, resetting its color.

methods.name: $emitSelect
methods.description: Updates the selected note ID and emits the selection event via callback.

methods.name: $select
methods.description: Emits selection of a note given its ID.

methods.name: $handleNew
methods.description: Creates a new note and selects it.

methods.name: $remove
methods.description: Removes a note after confirmation, updates the selection accordingly.
